name: analytic

effect.x-y: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.

short_effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

flavor_text.x-y: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves after the target.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves after the target.
